content: We have >370 users currently registered on Zulip (this came up on yesterday's FMG call). There are a bunch of duplicates (people who registered with two different email addresses) but still: we clearly have >300.
yeah. we have lots of people who have connected to Zulip but couldn't connect to skype
and the UI is so much nicer...
Now at 467. I'm kind of surprised to see this ticking up beyond 450.
Any limits that we know of? I expect it to keep on climbing...
We should be fine into the thousands.
And by that time, some performance improvements should have landed in zulip's stable branch.
I would think it will go into the thousands given the number implementers out there. ~2500 by year end (50 per country + some more for some)?
Well, we'll see how the infrastructure copes :-) We may need to throw additional resources at it when we get to that territory. Already we're 50% beyond the Skype limit.
